wikitext.*:
{{year-header}} 
Because this year marked the 100th birthday of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], it is often referred to as the '''Centenary year''' or '''Centennial Year'''.
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - Hundredth birthday of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - On this special day, the [[Finnish Tolkien Society]] is founded.
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - The premiere of the first episode of German radio serial adaptation ''[[Der Herr der Ringe (1992 German radio series)|Der Herr der Ringe]]'', a co-production of public radio broadcasters SWR (Südwestrundfunk) and WDR (Westdeutscher Rundfunk), on Tolkien's 100th birthday.
* '''[[6 January|6]] - ''[[Sauron Defeated]]'' is published in the UK.'''
* '''[[6 January|6]]''' - ''[[The Tolkien Family Album]]'' is published.
* '''[[11 January|11]]-[[12 January|12]]''' - On the occasion of the centenary, an International Tolkien Symposium is held in [[wikipedia:Aachen|Aachen, Germany]].
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 21|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 21]] is published.
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1992]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 113|''Amon Hen'' 113]] is published.

==February==
* '''[[10 February|10]]''' - Actor [[Charlie Vickers]] is born.

==March==
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 22]] is published.

==April==
* '''[[29 April|29]]''' - [[Stephen Oliver]] dies.
* '''?''' - Conclusion of the German radio serial adaptation ''[[Der Herr der Ringe (1992 German radio series)|Der Herr der Ringe]]''.

==May==
* '''[[22 May|22]]-[[24 May|24]]''' - [[The Tolkien Phenomenon]] is held.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 23|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 23]] is published.

==July==
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 24|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 24]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[16 August|16]]''' - The first part of the [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio adaptation of ''Farmer Giles of Ham'']] is aired on [[BBC|BBC 5]]. 
* '''[[16 August|16]]-[[24 August|24]]''' - [[Tolkien Centenary Conference]], a combination of [[Oxonmoot]] and [[Mythcon]].
* '''[[23 August|23]]''' - The second part of the [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio adaptation of ''Farmer Giles of Ham'']] is aired on [[BBC|BBC5]]. 
* '''[[30 August|30]]''' - The [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio adaptation of ''Smith of Wootton Major'']] is aired on [[BBC|BBC 5]]. 
* '''?''' - ''[[The Making of The Lord of the Rings]]'' by [[Rayner Unwin]] is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 29|''Mallorn'' 29]] is published.

==September==
* '''[[6 September|6]]''' - The first part of the [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio adaptation of ''The Adventures of Tom Bombadil'']] is aired on [[BBC|BBC5]]. 
* '''[[13 September|13]]''' - The second part of the [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio adaptation of ''The Adventures of Tom Bombadil'']] is aired on [[BBC|BBC5]]. 
* '''[[20 September|20]]''' - The [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio adaptation of ''Leaf by Niggle'']] is aired on [[BBC|BBC5]]. 
* '''[[22 September|22]]''' - The Danish [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] [[Tolkiens Følge]] is founded.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 25|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 25]] is published.

==October==
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - ''[[Sauron Defeated]]'' is published in the US.
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' (revised edition) is published.

==November==
* [[6 November|6]] - [[Robert Aramayo]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 26|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 26]] is published.

==Fall==
* '''?''' - ''[[The Tolkien Collector]]'' is founded.
==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien and Middle-earth Handbook]]'' by [[Colin Duriez]] is published.
* '''?''' - The Bulgarian magazine ''[[Duga]]'' ceases to exist, cutting short their comic book version of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' at the [[Breaking of the Fellowship]].
* '''?''' - An abridged [[Audiobooks|reading]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is published by [[Caedmon]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien's World: Paintings of Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien: The Illustrated Encyclopedia]]'' by [[David Day]] is published.
* '''?''' - The documentary [[Tolkien Remembered]] is aired.
* '''?''' - ''[[The First and Second Ages]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Basic Quenya]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[The Tolkien Calendar 1993]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1993 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] released.
* '''?''' - Eric Thompson notices small differences between the first and second impressions of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and informs the publishers; [[Rayner Unwin]] discovers that the printer had quietly reset the volume types 38 years earlier.
{{Years|1989|1990|1991|1992|1993|1994|1995|}}
